title: MarketWatch - Inflation, Older Workers and Their Impending Retirements
description: Inflation is changing the way Americans spend and save, as well as how they plan to retire. Join MarketWatch reporter Alessandra Malito and AARP expert David John as they discuss what near-retirees are faring with record-high inflation, and what this all means for an older workforce and generation hoping to retire.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
